::Hot Rod/Epyon::

Hot Rod runs out, into the battle area. Epyon slowly walks behind him.
Hot Rod turns to Epyon and Khonkolor.
"Lets work together guys. I dont have a problem fighting in the end, if
we get rid of the rest of these guys."
"I agree, lets work together," says Epyon.
"What about you, Khonkolor?" Asks Hot Rod.
